title: Edinburgh Castle Hotel
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This pub has a separate dedicated meat-free menu of simple and filling meals (pub food). Also stocks a range of vegan wines, beers, and ciders. Vegans need to specify if you would like the vegan version of a particular (vegetarian) dish when ordering.
